backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user caffeine tracking with profiles, entries, presets, and settings stored per principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend files, components, and related requirements with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for key frontend files describing styles, config, pages, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, global layout, and routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: Global layout with header, navigation tabs, footer, and user greeting based on loaded profile.
frontend/src/components/app/QueryState.t: Shared UI components for loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with query cache clearing and auto‑retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time profile creation with name input and save handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps children with authentication checks, showing login UI or profile setup dialog when needed.
frontend/src/components/caffeine/EntryFo: Dialog for creating or editing caffeine entries with preset selection and form submission logic.
frontend/src/components/caffeine/PresetM: Manages creation and display of caffeine drink presets with a form and list of existing presets.
frontend/src/components/caffeine/TrendCh: Renders a 7‑day bar chart of caffeine totals with limit indicators using calculated SVG layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and handles login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, profiles, caffeine entries, presets, and settings via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light and dark modes, and global typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays today's caffeine intake, progress toward limits, and provides an entry form dialog with auto-open support.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Generates 7‑day caffeine trends, totals, and limit comparisons, rendering charts and insight cards.
frontend/src/pages/LogPage.tsx: Lists all caffeine entries grouped by date with delete actions and a shortcut to add a first entry.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows updating daily caffeine limits and managing presets, with validation and save actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for persistent routing state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state including versioning, existing features, new requests, and metadata for a UX improvement project.
